stork.net

Class StorkInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.net.StorkInterface
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseTCPInterface, HTTPInterface, TCPInterface

    public abstract class StorkInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    An interface which awaits incoming client requests and passes them on to the scheduler.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StorkInterface(Scheduler scheduler)
      Create a StorkInterface for the given scheduler.

        Create a StorkInterface for the given scheduler.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static StorkInterface create(Scheduler scheduler,
                    URI uri)
        Automatically determine and create an interface from a URI.
        Parameters:
        scheduler - the scheduler to provide an interface for.
        uri - the URI specifying the interface to listen on.
        Returns:
        A StorkInterface listening for connection at endpoint specified by uri.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an interface could not be created based on the URI.

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name()
        Get the name of this interface. This is used for logging purposes.
        Returns:
        the name of this interface.

      • address

        public abstract java.lang.String address()
        Get a description of the address this interface is listening on. This is used for logging purposes.
        Returns:
        the description of this interface's address.

      • issueRequest

        protected Bell<Request> issueRequest(Bell<Ad> request)
        Used by subclasses to issue a request ad to the scheduler asynchronously. This delegates to issueRequest(Ad) asynchronously, and returns the associated Request object asynchronously through a bell.
        Parameters:
        request - (via bell) the request in the form of an ad.
        Returns:
        (via bell) The enqueued Request object returned by the scheduler.

      • issueRequest

        protected Request issueRequest(Ad request)
        Used by subclasses to issue a request ad to the scheduler. The Request object returned by this method is a bell which will be rung with the response object. The subclass should promise the request to a handler which will appropriately marshal the response object.
        Parameters:
        request - the request in the form of an ad.
        Returns:
        The enqueued Request object returned by the scheduler.

      • handler

        protected Scheduler.Handler handler(java.lang.String command)
        Get the scheduler handler for a command.

      • errorToAd

        public static final Ad errorToAd(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Create an ad representing a Throwable.
        Parameters:
        throwable - a Throwable to return an ad representing.
        Returns:
        An ad representing throwable.
